page.title: 18CLUBS & SOCIETIES
page.content: At Myers Grove School there are a large variety of clubs such as: wildlife,art,canoes,chess,computers, railway society.orienteering.Usually any sport clubs E.G:hockey,rugby,netball.There are many clubs associated with the subjects that we learn in school. like English,Maths,Cooking,ECT.Roughly there are 90 clubs in just Lower School,for every age and sex.There is always something to remember about this school,either once or twice a year there will be a holiday abroad to Germany/Spain or France or may be some place else like Austria_skiing. These holidays are helpful because it helps us with our education in school. A well known trip is to Alton Towers. The summer fair raised money for the school clubs and local charities.
